text: Doris Roberts (November 4, 1925 - April 17, 2016) was an American actress. She acted in movies, television and on stage. She was known for her role as Marie Barone in the sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond. Roberts died in Los Angeles, California, on April 17, 2016, at age 90 in her sleep, due to a stroke. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Doris Roberts
